title: New: TV Girl – Diet-Coke
content:
Everyone know that the majority of artists have a fairly distinctive ‘sound’.

Whether it’s an element that is ingrained in their songwriting or a preference when it gets down to the production stages, it’s a fairly unavoidable and not entirely negative trait. So, what happens when an artist purposefully goes out of their way to not only change their sound, but to replicate that of another musician? Well, in the case of LA’s TV Girl, who set themselves the goal of writing and recording a Youth Lagoon ‘style ditty’, entitled Diet-Coke, and you know what, it isn’t half bad.

So it’s feels slightly like a watered down (or sugar free if you must ha ha ha) version of Mr Powers, awash with reverb drenched vocals and even a hopelessly addictive hook, however given that mimicking his sound was their intention, they’ve done a bloody good job of it. Check it out below and consider donating to their Kickstarter to help fund the purchase of a tour van. (NB The top prize, available for donating $1000, is to have TV Girl record a song in the style of any artist recommended by you)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
